Comment:
On load mission
STRM_ONLOAD_INTRO,Behind enemy lines"
column6:
On load intro

STRM_19v01,Check your equipment. We're gonna have to be fast. The whole base is crawling with infantry and the hills are full of patrols."

English: We've got the charges, comrade major.

Let's go then. Use the cover of the night to get as close to the base as possible. I'll call you after midnight to go in.\nPlant the charges then wait for my signal to blow it up. I want the fireworks to be seen back in Washington.
ONE TO TWO AND THREE, LET'S GET THIS PARTY STARTED. APPROACH THE BASE AND DO YOUR PART. I'LL HANDLE THE REST. LET ME KNOW WHEN YOU'RE READY TO LIGHT THE BASE, OUT.
WHATEVER THEY STORED THERE HAS BLOWN UP SKY HIGH. OBJECTIVE COMPLETED.
TWO TO ONE, CHARGES ARE SET. I FOUND ONLY LIGHT TANKS THOUGH. READY WHEN YOU ARE.
THREE TO ONE, I PLANTED THE CHARGES. ONLY APCS, COULDN'T FIND THE HEAVY ARMOUR. READY TO BLOW IT UP.
ONE UNDERSTOOD. WAIT FOR MY SIGNAL.
IT SEEMS THEY MOVED THE HEAVY TANKS OUT OF THE BASE. SHIT. WE'RE GONNA HAVE TO DEAL WITH THEM LATER. GET READY TO LIGHT THE BASE ON MY SIGNAL.
TIME FOR THE FIREWORKS. BLOW IT UP!
GOOD WORK, GUYS. THOSE TANKS ARE OUT OF COMMISSION FOREVER. I'LL SEE YOU BACK AT THE BASE.
